actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A joint resolution providing for the commemoration of the one hundredth anniversary of the birth of Franklin Delano Roosevelt.

summary.text: Establishes a Special Joint Committee on the Centennial of the Birth of Franklin Delano Roosevelt. Directs that such committee be composed of sixteen Members of Congress. Directs such committee to prepare an overall program for nationwide observances and make comprehensive plans for commemorating the one hundredth anniversary of the birth of Franklin Delano Roosevelt, including a joint session of Congress to be held on January 27, 1982. Provides that such committee shall terminate not later than April 30, 1982.

titles.title: A joint resolution providing for the commemoration of the one hundredth anniversary of the birth of Franklin Delano Roosevelt.
